title: S14 Ep42: Building The Case For Bigfoot
itunes:title: Building The Case For Bigfoot
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS kicks off this Memorial Day weekend by presenting a special encore presentation with Dr. Jeffrey Meldrum who joins us to talk about why Bigfoot is real, why it may not be, and what his research shows...
